Do you have Health card or Vaccination Document/Booklet Reason not vaccinated for BCG, Polio, Penta, and MV How often does the baby sleep under a bednet? Last Pregnancy Date Reason for Admission? How long after birth did you start Breastfeeding? How old (in days) was the baby when you started giving the baby food or drinks? How old (in months) was the baby when you started giving the baby food or drinks? How old (in months) was the baby when you stopped breastfeeding? How old (in years) was the baby when you stopped breastfeeding? National Health Insurance Scheme Are you still breastfeeding? Has the baby been admitted at a health facility in the last six months? Does your household have a bednet? Did the baby sleep under bednet last Night? How many children sleep under the bednet? Weight of child at birth in Kg? Does the child have the BCG scar? (Observe) In the last two weeks did the child report Fever Did you seek for treatment? In the last two weeks did the child report diarrhoea? In the last two weeks did the child report acute respiratory tract infection? Mid-Upper Arm circumference (MUAC) Bacille Calmette-Guerin Vaccine (BCG) Oral Polio Vaccine (OPV0) Oral Polio Vaccine (OPV1) Oral Polio Vaccine (OPV2) Oral Polio Vaccine (OPV3) Age in Months Age in Weeks Inactivated Polio Vaccine (IPV) Meningococcal Vaccine (MenA) Insecticide treated net (ITN) Send Vaccination

Date of Outcome Pregnancy Outcome Number of Outcomes Child Permid Type of Outcome Q22.0 Did you ever breastfeed the child? Q23.0 How long after delivery did you first put child to the breast? Q24.0 In the first 2 days after birth was the child given anything other than breastmilk to drink (water, infant formula) Q25.0 Are you still breastfeeding the child? Q26.0 What did you feed the child with in the first 6 months of birth? Q14.0 Do you have plans to have more children? Q14.1 If YES, how long will you want to wait before becoming pregnant again? Q15.0 Are you currently using any family planning method to delay or prevent pregnancy? Q15.1 If Yes/NO, what will be your specific family planning method of preference when finally you decide to use one?

Hello first fragment Hello second fragment. Arg: %1$s Select Village to View Remaining Compounds Q3.0 Why was child not delivered at health facility Q4.0 Who assisted you during deivery? Q5.0 How was the child delivered? Q20.0 Is this your first live birth? Q21.0 How many previous live births have you had? Q6.0 During the time that you were pregnant, did you receive any Antenatal Care? Q6.1 Why, No? Q7.0 Where did you receive the ANC? Which health facility? Q8.0 Who attended to you? Q9.0 How many months pregnant were you when you first received Antenatal Care? Q10.0 How many ANC visits did you make before you delivered? Q11.0 During the time that you were pregnant, did you receive IPT infront of a nurse? Q12.0 How many months pregnant were you when you first received IPT? Q13.0 How many times did you take IPT in front of a nurse during the pregnancy? Q18.0 Was the child weighed at birth? Q20.0 How much did the child weigh (estimated baby size) Q19.0 Record weight in kilograms from Health Card Pregnancy Without Outcome Close

Instructions: This Form should be completed to collect sociodemographic information for the household. SECTION A INTRODUCTION A1 Gestational age at time of visit A2 MNH Participant ID: A3 Interview Date: A4 Screening Location A5 Specify Other Location
SECTION B General Information B1 What is your marital status? B1a If married, age at time of marriage? B2 What is your religion? B2a Specify Other religion B3 What is your ethnicity? B3a Other Northern Tribe B3b Other Ethnicity/Tribe
SECTION C Size of Household C1 Who is the head of your household\? C1a Other Specify C2 What is the total number of people living in your household\? This is defined as the number of people who typically sleep under the same roof as you, including yourself. C2a Of the total number of people living in your household, how many are children under the age 5\? That is, how many children less than 5 years of age typically sleep under the same roof as you\? C2b Of the total number of people living in your household (including yourself), how many are 5 years of age or older\? That is, how many people 5 years of age or older typically sleep under the same roof as you\?
SECTION D Household Assets: Drinking Water D1 What is the main source of drinking water for members of your household\? D1a Other Specify D2 How far away is this source of drinking water(In Meters) D3 How long does it take to get water and come back D4 Do you do anything to this water before you drink it\? D5 What do you usually do to this water before you drink it\? D5a Boil D5b Chlorine D5c Alum D5d Filter D5e Water Purification Tablet
SECTION E Household Assets: Toilet Facilities E1 What kind of toilet facility do members of your household usually use\? E1o Other, specify E2 Where is the toilet facility located\? E2o Other, specify E3 Do you share this toilet with other households\? E3o Specify the number of other households that share this toilet\?
SECTION F Household Assets: Building Structure and Materials F1 What is the main building material of your household\'s exterior walls\? F1o Other Specify F2 What is the main building material of your household\'s floor\? F2o Other Specify F3 What is the main building material of your household\'s roof\? F3o Other Specify
SECTION G Household Assets: Amenities G1 Does your household have any of following amenities\? G1a Electricity G1b Solar panels G1c Internet access G1d Non-mobile phone G2 Does your household have a mobile telephone\? G2o Specify No. G3 Do you have access to a mobile phone\? G3a Yes, I have my own mobile phone G3b Yes, but I share the mobile phone with other people G3c No, I do not have access to a mobile phone G4 Do you or any member of your household own any of the following items\? Specify number Specify Specify other Specify number of other G4a Radio G4b Television G4c Refrigerator G4d Computer G4e Watch G4f Bicycle G4g Motorcycle or moto scooter G4h Car or truck G4i Boat with motor G4j Animal drawn cart G4k Plough G4l Foam mattress G4m Straw mattress G4n Spring mattress G4o Sofa G4p Lantern G4q Sewing machine G4r Washing machine G4s Blender G4t Mosquito nets G4u Tricycle (motor king/pragia) G4v Tables G4w Cabinets/cupboards G4x Satellite dish G4y DVD/CD player G4z Air conditioner G4aa Tractor G5 Do you own or rent the house you live in, or have another type of arrangement, such as "perching"\? G6 Specify how many rooms in this household are available for sleeping G7 Does the household have a separate sleeping room for children\?
SECTION H Household Assets: Land and Livestock H1 Does your household own any agricultural land\? H2 How is land currently used\? H2a Homestead use H2b Cultivation H2c Pasture or grazing H2d Rented H3e Left fallow H2o Other H3 Does your household own any livestock, herds, farm animals/poultry\? H3a.Cattle H3b.Goat H3c.Sheep H3d.Poultry H3e.Pigs H3f.Donkey H3g.Horse H3o Other H3os Other->Specify Dogs Guinea Pigs/Pigs Cats Fish Birds (e.g., parrots, canaries, finches) Rabbits Reptiles (e.g., turtles, lizards, snakes) Other Pet What is the vaccination status of your pet(s) against rabies(s)? Other Specify
SECTION I Occupation I1 What is your main occupation\? That is, what is the main kind of work that you do to generate income\? I2 What is your partner\'s main occupation\? That is, what is the main kind of work that your partner does for income generation\?
SECTION J Exposure to Household Air Pollution J1 What type of cookstove is mainly used for cooking in your household\? J2 What type of fuel or energy source is used in this cookstove\? J2a Electricity J2b Solar energy J2c Alcohol/ethanol J2d Gasoline/diesel J2e Kerosene/paraffin J2f Coal/lignite J2g Charcoal J2h Wood J2i Straw/shrubs/grass J2j Agricultural crop J2k Animal dung/waste K2l Processed biomass (pellets) or woodchips J2m Garbage/plastic J2n Sawdust J2o Other J2os Other->Specify J3 Is cooking usually done inside the house\? J3a If yes Do you have a separate room which is used as a kitchen\? J3b Where is cooking usually done\? J4 Are there windows or doors for ventilation in the room that is usually used for cooking\?
SECTION K Health Behaviors K1 Do you smoke cigarettes/cigars/a pipe\? K2 How often do you smoke inside the house\? K3 Do any other members of your household smoke cigarettes/cigars/a pipe\? K4 How often do other members of your household smoke inside the house\? K5 In the last month, did you chew tobacco\? K6 In the last month, did you chew betel nut\? K7 In the last month, did you have any kind of drink containing alcohol\?
SECTION L Plans for Delivery L1 Where does the participant plan to give birth\? L2 In the participant\'s household, who usually makes the decision about where she will give birth\? SOCIO-DEMOGRAPHIC (PROFILE) meters Minutes Hours N/A Refuse to answer Optional additional comments: Are there any comments to add\?:
